PathOfBuilding.Notes:
When you get Vitality watchers eye and socket vitality drop faster casting on your wither totem setup for vitality, just make sure that vitality is not linked to the totem support because it will totemize it instead of it being applied all the time
You could drop increased duration instead for a bit faster ramp up on your withered, but i think that utility of having longer movement speed duration from smoke mine and longer duration of immortall call outweighs the slightly faster dps ramp up
you can apply 15 withered stacks in 1 second with just 3 link on your totems + withering step
Vaal skills gems like Vaal Blight and Vaal haste are only damage increase on maps, you won't have it for tough fights like Sirus, Maven and Invitations, however they will help with Shaper/elder guardian maps early on while your dps is bad,
once you get better gear and dps that you can kill those easily, drop Vaal Blight and link your withering step to increased AOE, it will drastically improve your clear speed and will allow you to keep better distance from bosses while still withering them
you already have to press so many buttons for good boss dps and pressing another is just a pain in the ass with very limited gain on only certain bosses
example of my setup while i still use Vaal blight
Left click - Detonate mines while mapping( swap Blood rage on left click for bosses) Right click - toxic rain q - withering step(you might think that linking this on left click is the way to go but you would be wrong, it would get wasted too much and would consume your smoke mine charges and put it on cooldown, only use it for blue packs/rare mobs and for movespeed buff when you need) w - berserk e - smoke mine r - despair t- blood rage(swap to vaal blight before boss) middle mouse - wither totems
this way you don't have to worry about dropping blood rage for attack speed loss or loss of extra damage while leeching and you get to use vaal blight without having to press yet another button for your second skill bar, it takes a while to get used to, but early on your basically throw everything you have at a boss when you have low dps, later on you don't need half these things except for SIrus, Maven, other endgame bosses and guardian/breachlord invitations
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
